protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol with GeneChip IVT Labeling Kit and Genechip Sample Cleanup Module (Affymetrix)

Total RNA was extracted from the leaves using the Trizol method (Invitrogen) and purified with RNeasy MiniKit (Qiagen). cDNA was synthesized and purified with one-cycle cDNA Synthesis Kit (Affymetrix) and GeneChip Sample Cleanup Module (Affymetrix), respectively.
